Introduction
This topic contains information about reductions under 38 CFR 3.105(e), including
reducing or terminating compensation awards
evidentiary standard for reduction due to improvement
handling proof of substantially gainful employment
when to apply the provisions of 38 CFR 3.105(e)
reductions
in staged ratings
, and
not affecting combined evaluations
concurrent increases and reductions
reduction offset by subsequent increased evaluation
authorizing reexamination
reviewing new evidence and preparing the final rating
, and
determining the effective date
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Rating Decisions for Reduction Due to Improvement
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
